depositTokens(bytes32,uint256).details: Deposits ERC20 tokens for an existing HTLC

initiateFusionHTLC(bytes32,address,bytes.details: Initiates an enhanced HTLC swap with 1inch Fusion+ integration for true BTC<->ETH atomic swaps

params._bitcoinHTLCAddress: Bitcoin HTLC address for cross-chain coordination
params._resolver: Address that can redeem the funds
params._secretHash: SHA-256 hash of the preimage (must match Bitcoin HTLC)
params._timelock: Duration in seconds for the timelock

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

redeemHTLC(bytes32,bytes,uint256).details: Redeems an HTLC swap (supports partial fills)

params.fillAmount: Amount to fill (0 for full amount)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
